# windowDidResignMain(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the window has resigned main window status.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowDidResignMain(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/didResignMainNotification].

## Discussion

You can retrieve the window object in question by sending [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] to `notification`.

## Managing Main Status

- **windowDidBecomeMain(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the window has become main.
